text: this is Christian not Iike a travel
lover since birth
Christian hails from Dusseldorf Germany
but left home five years ago to pursue
his dream volunteering around the world
welcome to after five months of
traveling in Southeast Asia I saw some
of the poorest areas and I wanted to do
everything to get back from Cambodia to
Germany to India to Thailand Christian
dive headfirst into societies to help
make people's lives better
building schools teaching English to
monks teaching football to kids you name
it and he's done it even with a few
hours of teaching English a day the
children have a chance of a much
brighter future Christian moved to
Bangkok seven months ago and actually
lives in the building across the street
from me which is how I met him I've come
across many people who volunteer on
project and I myself have done it a few
times as well but I've never met someone
like Christian who has made it his life
mission so we here in Bangkok income toy
which is one of the first slums and all
of Bangkok within just one minute of
meeting him you can feel how much he
genuinely cares to help those in need
he's a people person
all six feet five inches of him the most
admire about thing about Christian story
in my eyes is that he doesn't care about
money he just wants to help people and
volunteering has led him to see the
world for free as his flights housing
and food is usually provided in exchange
for his hands on work I not being able
to see the country form a whole new
perspective of a local person he doesn't
take additional payments so aside from
helping people what is his motive for
doing all of this I really want to get
more people to travel the world and get
out of the bubble or get off their
comfort zone so if you want a volunteer
there's either roofing or work away and
you just go on the website there's a
one-time payment of 30 euro and then you
have access to over thousands hosts
worldwide in over 170 countries we can
select the project it's been really
inspiring to hear Christian story and I
have a feeling that this will not be the
last time we meet
yup I'm drivin ski and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
